Writing Assignment

1\. 5 paragraphs (as listed in the syllabus)

a) You should provide an outline before writing the paragraph.

b) Each paragraph should include more than 14 lines and less than 24 lines.

c) Please make sure the format is correct.

d) Please hand in your assignment with a well-typed paper version by 18: 00 of Tuesday after we meet.  And you also should send it to my e-mail by the midnight of the same day.

2\. 8 journals (which should include a comment on one book, a description of a trip, a comment on one movie)

a) Each journal should include at least 250 words.

b) Every journal needs some feedback from one of your classmates.

c) Due date for the first four journals is Nov. 11th. 

Due date for the last four journals is Jan. 6th.

d) All the journals should be collected in a notebook, either typed or hand-written.

3\. Grammar Assignments
